questions.label: First Name
questions.description: Enter your first name.

questions.label: Middle Name
questions.description: Enter your Middle name.

questions.label: Last Name
questions.description: Enter your last name.

questions.label: Contact Number
questions.description: Enter your primary contact number. Format: +(Country Code) [Number]

questions.label: Alternate Contact Number
questions.description: Enter an alternate contact number. Format: +(Country Code) [Number]

questions.label: Email ID
questions.description: Enter your email address. Format: example@example.com.

questions.label: Date of Birth
questions.description: Select your date of birth from the calendar.

questions.label: Age
questions.description: Enter your age. Format: 25

questions.label: Marital Status
questions.description: Enter your marital status.

questions.label: Nationality / Citizen
questions.description: Enter the name of the Country of nationality or citizenship.

questions.label: Blood Group
questions.description: Enter your blood group. Format: O+, A-, etc.

questions.label: Current Residential Address
questions.description: Enter your current residential address in Full along with City, State, Postal Code

questions.label: Permanent Residential Address
questions.description: Enter your Permanent Residential Address in Full along with City, State, Postal Code

questions.label: Current Location
questions.description: Enter your current city of residence.

questions.label: Preferred Location
questions.description: Enter your preferred city of residence.

questions.label: Do you have a passport?
questions.description: Select 'Yes' if you have a passport, otherwise select 'No'.

questions.label: Passport Number
questions.description: If you selected 'Yes' above, enter your passport number.

questions.label: Upload your Passport Copy
questions.description: If you selected 'Yes' above, Upload a copy of your passport.

questions.label: Aadhaar Card Number
questions.description: Enter your Aadhaar card number.

questions.label: Upload your Aadhaar Card Copy
questions.description: Upload a copy of your Aadhaar Card.

questions.label: PAN Card Number
questions.description: Enter your PAN card number.

questions.label: Upload your PAN Card Copy
questions.description: Upload a copy of your PAN Card.

questions.label: Driving License Details (if applicable)
questions.description: Enter your driving license number if applicable.

questions.label: Upload your Driving License Copy
questions.description: Upload a copy of your Driving License Card.

questions.label: Voter ID Card Details (if applicable)
questions.description: Enter your Voter ID card number if applicable.

questions.label: Upload your Voter ID Copy
questions.description: Upload a copy of your Voter ID Card.

questions.label: Photograph
questions.description: Upload a recent passport-sized photograph.

questions.label: Work Link/Portfolio (LinkedIn)
questions.description: Provide a link to your LinkedIn profile or online portfolio.

questions.label: Please attach your updated Resume/CV
questions.description: Upload your resume and portfolio.

questions.label: Please share the links of your Social Media Profiles (LinkedIn, Facebook, Instagram, etc.)
questions.description: Provide links to your social media profiles.

questions.label: Please share the links of your Online Portfolio or Website (if applicable) {If none please mention NA}
questions.description: Provide the link to your online portfolio or personal website.

questions.label: Skills
questions.description: List down all the Skills you possess.

questions.label: Languages
questions.description: List the Languages you are Proficient in.

questions.label: Education: Course
questions.description: Enter the course you have completed.

questions.label: Education: Specialization
questions.description: Enter your area of specialization.

questions.label: Education: Institution
questions.description: Enter the name of the institution where you completed your course.

questions.label: Education: Year of Completion
questions.description: Enter the date you completed your course.

questions.label: Education: Pass Percentage
questions.description: Enter the percentage you achieved in your course. Format: 85.6%.

questions.label: Upload Proof of Education Completion
questions.description: Upload the proof of your education completion. Please upload your Consolidated MarkSheet or Semester Marksheet, Provisional Degree Certificate, Degree Completion Certificate.

questions.label: Any Certifications
questions.description: Select 'Yes' if you have any certifications, otherwise select 'No'.

questions.label: Certifications Obtained
questions.description: List the certifications you have obtained.

questions.label: Name of Certification Issuing Authority
questions.description: Enter the name of the authority that issued the certification.

questions.label: Certification Completion Date
questions.description: Select the date when the certification was issued.

questions.label: Upload Proof of Certification
questions.description: Upload the proof of your certification.

questions.label: Please Enter a Tentative Date you are expected to join us in case you are shortlisted/selected
Consent to conduct background checks
questions.description: Select 'YES' if you consent to background checks, otherwise select 'NO' or 'MAYBE'.

questions.label: Consent to Drug/Alcohol Testing
questions.description: Select 'YES' if you consent to drug/alcohol testing, otherwise select 'NO' or 'MAYBE'.

questions.label: Disclosure of any Criminal Convictions or Pending Criminal Cases
questions.description: Select 'YES' if you have any criminal convictions or pending criminal cases, otherwise select 'NO'.

questions.label: Details of any Criminal Convictions or Pending Criminal Cases
questions.description: If you selected 'YES' above, please provide details of your criminal convictions or pending criminal cases, including charges, dates, and outcomes.

questions.label: By submitting this form, I acknowledge that all the information provided is true and accurate to the best of my knowledge.
questions.description: Select 'YES' if you acknowledge that all information provided is true and accurate, otherwise select 'NO'.
